#|||||SETTINGS|||||
stratumproxy enabled

globalminer ethminer
claymore=flags -allcoins etc
stratumproxy miner
safevolt disabled
flags --cl-global-work 8192 --farm-recheck 200

#(clocks)
#globalcore 
#globalmem 
globalfan 90
#globalpowertune 
maxgputemp 95

#(dual mine)
#dualminer enabled
#dualminer-coin
#dualminer-wallet
#dualminer-pool
